<!-- Styles intégrés -->
<style>
/* ==== Variables CSS ==== */
:root {
  --primary-color: #2c3e50;
  --secondary-color: #0366d6;
  --accent-color: #ef476f;
  --light-bg: #f8f9fa;
  --text-dark: #333;
  --text-medium: #555;
  --text-light: #777;
  --shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  --shadow-hover: 0 10px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
  --border-radius: 10px;
}

/* ==== Cartes de projets ==== */
.card {
  background-color: #ffffff;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  overflow: hidden;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow);
  transition: transform 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 350px;
}

.card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-8px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-hover);
}

.card img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 180px;
  object-fit: cover;
}

.card-body {
  padding: 20px;
  flex-grow: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.card-body h3 {
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  color: var(--primary-color);
  font-size: 1.4rem;
}

.card-body p {
  color: var(--text-medium);
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  line-height: 1.6;
  flex-grow: 1;
}

.tags {
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 8px;
}

.tag {
  display: inline-block;
  background-color: var(--secondary-color);
  color: #fff;
  padding: 4px 12px;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.tag.r { background-color: #276dc2; }
.tag.python { background-color: #3776ab; }
.tag.sql { background-color: #f29111; }
.tag.powerbi { background-color: #f2c811; color: #000; }
.tag.tableau { background-color: #e9763c; }
.tag.ggplot2 { background-color: #4c72b0; }
.tag.lubridate { background-color: #7cb5d2; }

.btn-project {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  background-color: var(--accent-color);
  color: #fff;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  font-weight: bold;
  text-align: center;
  transition: all 0.3s;
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  margin-top: auto;
}

.btn-project:hover {
  background-color: #d43c5a;
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

/* ==== Section accueil ==== */
.section-intro {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 50px;
  padding: 40px 20px;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), #1a2530);
  color: white;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
}

.section-intro h1 {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  color: white;
}

.section-intro p {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  line-height: 1.7;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
}

.section-intro strong {
  color: #ffd166;
}

/* ==== Sections ==== */
.section {
  margin-bottom: 60px;
  padding: 30px;
  background-color: white;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow);
}

.section h2 {
  font-size: 2rem;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  color: var(--primary-color);
  border-bottom: 3px solid var(--accent-color);
  padding-bottom: 10px;
}

.section p {
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  line-height: 1.7;
  color: var(--text-medium);
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.section ul {
  list-style: none;
  padding-left: 0;
  color: var(--text-medium);
}

.section li {
  padding: 8px 0;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #eee;
  position: relative;
  padding-left: 30px;
}

.section li:before {
  content: "▸";
  color: var(--accent-color);
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.section a {
  color: var(--secondary-color);
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: color 0.3s;
}

.section a:hover {
  color: var(--accent-color);
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* ==== Grille projets ==== */
.projects-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(320px, 1fr));
  gap: 30px;
  margin-top: 30px;
}

/* ==== Footer ==== */
.section-footer {
  margin-top: 50px;
  padding: 30px;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: var(--text-light);
  text-align: center;
  background-color: var(--light-bg);
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
}

/* ==== Responsive ==== */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .card img {
    height: 160px;
  }
  
  .section-intro h1 {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .section-intro p {
    font-size: 1.1rem;
  }
  
  .section {
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .projects-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 20px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .section-intro h1 {
    font-size: 1.8rem;
  }
  
  .section h2 {
    font-size: 1.6rem;
  }
  
  .card {
    max-width: 100%;
  }
}
</style>
